title: New Mobile Self Care Application Delivers More Options for Subscribers, Enhancing Satisfaction
text:
Beesion Technologies, LLC 
FT. LAUDERDALE, Fla., Sept. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Beesion Technologies, LLC, a provider of Business Support System software, has released a powerful, yet easy-to-use, mobile self care application that enables carriers to better serve their subscribers, and thus enhance customer satisfaction. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150925/270973-INFO 
The app enables wireless subscribers to easily manage their account; upgrade to new plans and even purchase additional services. It works on any device with Internet access. 
"Our Mobile Self Care application allows subscribers greater flexibility to address their ever-changing usage and service needs," said Omar Merchan, CEO and founder of Bession. "We believe this important functionality will translate into higher customer satisfaction, greater loyalty and ARPU for the carriers that deploy it." 
The Mobile Self Care app - like all of Beesion's software solutions - sits on top of a carriers' existing infrastructure, so there's no downtown or disruption of service. 
It's implemented in months, not years, using Beesion's unique software framework that eliminates most custom development, and instead relies on pre-built software modules . 
The Mobile Self-Care app plugs into a carrier's existing systems - billing, rating, customer care, and others - via secure REST/SOAP technologies. 
With the app, subscribers can self-manage a wide range of service subscription settings and features. They can: -- Check their account status, service plan and current balance -- Dispute usage or other charges and track the resolution process -- Change auto-pay subscriptions and payment methods -- Check service subscription of their account and dependent accounts -- Upgrade service subscriptions for their account and dependent accounts -- Enable or disable services for their account and dependent accounts -- Request additional service lines -- Convert mobile prepaid into postpaid plan -- Check their loyalty rewards program account and redeem points. 
The Mobile Self-Care app can be implemented as a standalone application or part of a suite of Beesion solutions. All Beesion applications comply with TM Forum standards. 
About Beesion: Since 2002, Beesion has helped dozens of telecom companies - in more than 20 countries - expertly serve their subscribers with groundbreaking BSS software. Beesion's rich set of thirty applications enables multiple departments - Sales, Marketing, Customer Care, Finance, and IT - to efficiently and profitably manage, analyze and interact with subscribers, at every point of the customer journey. For more information, visit www.beesion.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/new-mobile-self-care-application-delivers-more-options-for-subscribers-enhancing-satisfaction-300149399.html
